phrs.translation: 以男性为主的, 以男性为中心的, 心主义

sentences.sentence: Conventional study of the feminist criticism on Homer' epic assumes that the classical work is androcentric, with women depicted as disadvantaged and "awaiting to be saved".
sentences.translation: 一般对于“荷马史诗”所做的关于女性主义文学批评的研究都认为，在史诗中有一种男权思想，女性处于劣势的地位；
